B: Issued at 3.30 p.m. 28 August 2024, valid until 3.30 p.m. 29 August 2024

WW/O/24/08/28/01 ulletin No: 01: For Multi-day boats in the Northern Bay of Bengal deep sea areas.

B: A low-pressure area is likely to form over Northern Bay of Bengal tomorrow.  Very strong winds
(70-80) kmph accompanied with heavy rainfalls and very rough seas are likely over above sea

WW/O/24/08/28/01 ulletin No: 01: aval and fishing communities are advised not to venture into the sea areas bounded by
